channel.title: '07 Revival - Rs2007 Remake
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://img825.imageshack.us/img825/4320/07revivallogo.png[/img] [size=18pt]Welcome to '07 Revival™'s Development Page.[/size]
[size=14pt]- About '07 Revival™[/size][/CENTER] The concept of '07 Revival is to make The way Runecsape was in 2007. Runescape in 2007 was an great way to play and enjoy the game like it was. Over time when Runescape started giving some other features and new graphics we stoped enjoy the game like the way it schould be. So now we are getting an chance to put it back like it was. We are working hard to bring all those good old memories and we would be happy to get it done. We are not providing some other features of Runescape that was the time of 2008 and +. We are developing all way Rs was in 2007 and we are glad to make it come true. '07 Revival Means so to Reborn the 2007 RS.
[CENTER][size=14pt]- Developing team[/size][/CENTER] We are currently having three people who are developing "'07 Revival™" and we are not in need of some other people right now. We are maybe will having some need of helps and fix errors. But there only thing to say about the developers. Its because we work hard to make this project done and we maybe will not provide all the Informations in that thread and even on our website. We are trying to keep the server the most stable as we can. We are working on features but some features are somethimes ruin the stability of the server and we are working to repaire that. Anyway here an list of our Developers.
[CENTER]Mod Artem - Head Client Developer Mod Bradley - Source Developer Mod Dylan - Source Developer[/CENTER]
Note: I will not talk about Other positions like: Owner,Graphic artist and Website developer because first we are not having any Owners Because the highest Member Groupe here is Developer. We are all Graphic artists and we are all working on the website too. We having an "Mod" Before the name not because we are moderators.
[CENTER][size=14pt]- Features[/size][/CENTER] Stability -This is the most important part of developing because an great server must have great stability to not get any errors,lags and leaks. We dint tested our stability on how many players could be online at the same time but we are considering so its not that bad because we are using Hyperion and its way batter then Project Insanity and other servers like DeltaScape.
Skills - This is the most longest part of developing and we are currently working on it so all skills would be 100% like Runescape 2007. This spoiler will provide only Skilling Skills.
Minigames - To make Players enjoy the game even more then the game schould be and that means so minigames schould be perfect and we will try to fix all most all bugs and problems on minigames.[/COLOR]
[CENTER][size=14pt]- Media[/size][/CENTER] Note: Some of those pictures have '07 Ressurection name on it but its the same server but the name i changed because Ressurection was kinda too long and we had an better Name Idea. The real server will be same but The Ressurection will be changed to Revival.
[img]http://img98.imageshack.us/img98/3245/37071467.png[/img] [img]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/4126/22980898.png[/img] [img]http://img263.imageshack.us/img263/686/10500179.png[/img] [img]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/07revivalcooksassistant.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/07ressurectionduelarena.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/07revivalhomepage.jpg[/img]
[CENTER][size=14pt]- Support[/size][/CENTER] We are working hard on this project and we would like to invite you to support us and get the project in an step more closer to succed. Chose an banner and add those codes to the banner you would like in your signature. Comming soon

item.description:

Finally! A remake!

[/quote]SARCASM
No really I mean, what the fuck? Another remake, this must be a joke…

I think remakes are a good thing, they teach better coding than using some shit dspk, which im sure you do.

offTopic: Finally figured out the doors and gate system and fixed all the doors and gates around lumby.[/quote]I am not using DSPK you idiot. + I wasn’t talking about what you learn from remakes.

item.description:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:24, topic:408754”][quote author=Kono-chan link=topic=510033.msg3702703#msg3702703 date=1312843387]

Old Rs sucks, 2011 is soooo much better. PI is the greatest source out there.

I know right? I love seeing 600+ items on a 317, too. VENGEANCE HURR DURR!!!
[/quote]
I LVUS DA WEN SURTBER B PWNAGE SMOKIN PKERS PWNAGE RAP VIDS PKIN KORAC FUL TERM ZERK TORVUH FAGETASBITCHDICCKHEADHOAS SMOKIN TRILFAGS SMOKIN 9 YR OLD EMO ATENTION HOAR

OT
So…

Just curious… what made you want to do a 2007 anyways?[/quote]Well 459 is all of our favorite revision, being as thats when hunter and construction came out. And that sexy game frame.

And I was pissed that Vault made everyone think pja was trash just because he couldn’t code it. We’re already 10x farther than Vault was and we started yesterday.

We have music in certain areas now and some things have sounds. Bone burrying has correct timing and sound, dragon scimitar special has correct sound and timing, etc.
